import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selector' import CheckoutPageContainer from './checkout.container' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' import './checkout.styles.scss' const CheckoutPage = () => (

{ CheckoutPageContainer.cartItems.map(cartItem => ) }
TOTAL: ${CheckoutPageContainer.cartTotal}
